task_summary: Put down the bread from the gripper onto the table surface and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A fixed camera views a tabletop with several items (red cup, silver can, green bottle, blue can, small tan 'bread' pieces). The robot arm appears to already hold the bread and moves to place it onto the table. The behavior emphasizes a safe, contact-aware placement: approach above the table, descend until contact, release, and retreat to a neutral clearance. No re-grasping is required; alignment precision is modest as long as the bread is placed stably on the table.
preconditions: Bread is already in the gripper
Clear space on the table for placement
Arm has collision-free path above table
stepwise_plan: Move to a pose above the intended table spot
Lower until gentle contact is detected
Open the gripper to release bread
success_criteria: Bread rests on the table without slipping
Gripper is open and not contacting the bread
Arm ends at a safe clearance pose
failure_and_recovery: If object not in gripper, abort placement or request pick step
If contact not detected within max depth, time out and retry approach
If release fails, reopen gripper and slightly raise/relower
task_long_description.termination: End after successful release and retreat to clearance.

frame_3.now_evidence: Lowering phase with end-effector close to surface; impending contact cues are visible.
frame_3.predicts_next: Release expected soon after contact, followed by retreat.

node_specs.description: Verify the robot is holding the bread.
Move above table placement spot with clearance.
Descend until contact sensed to land bread gently.
Back off to a safe distance.

failure_modes: Bread not in gripper at start
No contact detected within allowed depth
Bread sticks to fingers after opening
Collision with nearby objects during approach/retreat
recovery_strategy: Abort and request pick if not holding
Re-approach from higher offset and retry lower-until-contact
Open/close cycle and slight vertical jiggle then retry release
Adjust approach path and increase clearance offset
assumptions: Frames suggest the bread is already grasped; instruction aligns with visible placement motions
Placement area is the table; symbolic target 'place_on_table' represents the chosen spot
